# Documentation

Welcome to the GenSBI documentation! This section provides comprehensive guides to help you use GenSBI effectively.

- **[Installation](/getting_started/installation)** - Install GenSBI and dependencies

### ðŸ“– Core Guides
- **[Conceptual Overview](/basics/overview)** - Understand the architecture: models, pipelines, and recipes

- **[Inference Guide](/basics/inference)** - Sample from trained posterior distributions

- **[Troubleshooting](/basics/troubleshooting)** - Solve common issues and FAQs
- **[Theoretical Overview](/theoretical_overview/index)** - Understand the theory behind Flow and Diffusion models
